Beowulf: title=<small>Beowulf: An Introduction to the Study of the Poem with a Discussion of the Stories of Offa and Finn</small>

{{disambig-more: '''''Beowulf: An Introduction to the Study of the Poem with a Discussion of the Stories of Offa and Finn''''' is a 1921 book by [[R.W. Chambers]] about ''[[Beowulf (poem)
By [[28 July]] [[1922]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] had agreed to review this book for G.N. Clark, editor of the ''English Historical Review''. He made [[Index:Unpublished material
Beowulf: several pages of notes]], but would not complete the review (or perhaps it was never published).<ref>{{webcite
column5: articlename=Addenda and Corrigenda to ''The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide'' (2006) Vol. 1: Chronology
